newsItems.title: February is here
fullText: Writing a blog in json is a little strange.
However, it can work for simple plain text blogs like this.
I mean I only have simple sentences here and I don't use fancy formatting so.
Maybe I can use an emoji? ðŸ¤”

newsItems.title: It is almost noon eastern now
newsItems.summary: I have beans in the instant pot on keep warm setting
fullText: I have beans in the instant pot on keep warm setting. I will eat it for lunch and also for dinner. It is almost one pm eastern now...
